SENT.plain: This is a case report of a 25-year-old female with recurrent episodes of transient cerebral ischemia accompanied by transient hemiparesis
Cardiac ultrasound examination revealed a small left-ventricular tumor located between the chordae tendineae
The echocardiographic finding was subsequently confirmed by surgery
The entire tumor was removed and the mitral valve remained intact
Due to the histological and immunohistochemical findings a papillary fibroelastoma was diagnosed
The early and late postoperative course was without event
